Player History
Drafted in 3rd round, 34th overall pick, by St. Louis (C) in 2019...
Traded from St. Louis (C) to Cincinnati on 3/2/2019 (Going to CIN: 2B James Gallucci. Going to STL: 1B Christopher Rapier)...
Injured on 8/2/2020 with a Torn Bicep Muscle, out for 5 weeks...
Traded from Cincinnati to Detroit on 3/2/2021 (Going to DET: 2B James Gallucci. Going to CIN: P Aubrey Dittmar)...
